name: A Floating Dude In Space - Collect and Dodge
name_original: A Floating Dude In Space - Collect and Dodge
description:
”Attractive Graphics.”
”Appealing Soundtrack. “
”Challenging levels.”
___________________________________

Space Dude is a highly fascinating game and, it's all about strategy, sci-fi / futuristic and action. It’s an iOS game that makes you enjoy its wild adventures with ultimate fun!

Help the Space Dude escape an enemy ship, gathering power ups on the way. Space Dude must clear the space station of the aliens in this classic arcade-style game. Feel free to download and enjoy this amusing Space Dude game!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Challenging Levels
Attractive Graphics.
Appealing Soundtrack
